alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:57AM EDT until July 01 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Bath County in east central Kentucky... South central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... West central Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 330 AM EDT. * At 257 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sideview, or 9 miles northwest of Mount Sterling, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Judy around 305 AM EDT. Mount Sterling around 310 AM EDT. Howards Mill around 315 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Jeffersonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
